author: Will Jones
description:
Renowned psychologist Jordan Peterson has declared that, in his professional opinion, climate doomsayers "are possessed by an ideology more akin to a psychogenic epidemic than they are purveyors of scientific information".

The post Jordan Peterson: Net Zero Alarmism is a Mental Illness appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Jordan Peterson: Net Zero Alarmism is a Mental Illness

author: Will Jones
description:
An Israeli Minister has accused Keir Starmer of "emboldening the forces of terror" after two Jewish staff members at his country’s embassy were shot by a pro-Palestine activist in Washington DC.

The post Israeli Minister Blames Starmer for “Emboldening” Washington Attacker Who Shot Dead Two Jewish Embassy Staff appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Israeli Minister Blames Starmer for “Emboldening” Washington Attacker Who Shot Dead Two Jewish Embassy Staff

author: Joe Baron
description:
Starmer put on a decent show of wanting to cut immigration. But we all know he's an open borders fanatic, and his actual actions – tax cuts for Indians, EU youth mobility – belie his true intentions, says Joe Baron.

The post Starmer Has No Intention of Cutting Immigration appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Starmer Has No Intention of Cutting Immigration

author: C.J. Strachan
description:
Why is the UK welcoming South African activist Julius Malema, who chants about killing white farmers, but excluding French philosopher Renaud Camus over his concerns about immigration and demographics, asks C.J. Strachan.

The post UK Welcomes South African Activist Who Chants About Killing White Farmers But Excludes French Philosopher Concerned About Demographic Change appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: UK Welcomes South African Activist Who Chants About Killing White Farmers But Excludes French Philosopher Concerned About Demographic Change

author: Will Jones
description:
A High Court judge has temporarily blocked Keir Starmer from handing the Chagos Islands to Mauritius pending a hearing over a challenge to the move, forcing the Prime Minister to cancel today's 'signing ceremony'.

The post High Court Judge Blocks Chagos Deal appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: High Court Judge Blocks Chagos Deal

author: Chris Morrison
description:
Stand aside Justin Rowlatt. The BBC has a new climate doom-monger in chief. With his tall tales of sea levels rising "several metres or more", Mark Poynting means to keep the population fully alarmed, says Chris Morrison.

The post The BBC’s Mark Poynting Shows How to Spread Climate Alarm appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The BBC’s Mark Poynting Shows How to Spread Climate Alarm

author: Steven Tucker
description:
High street posh soap retailer Lush, which recently ran a pro-trans campaign, has said it's always been "political". If aiming for a largely Left-wing workforce isn't against the law then it should be, says Steven Tucker.

The post If Lush’s Aim of Employing Left-Wing Activists Isn’t Against the Law it Should Be appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: If Lush’s Aim of Employing Left-Wing Activists Isn’t Against the Law it Should Be

author: Richard Eldred
description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
